label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug where WAITAOF could time out in the absence of write traffic when a new AOF was created, and an AOF rewrite couldn't immediately start.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Fixed a crash when running the rebalance command in a mixed Redis cluster of 7.0 and 7.2 nodes.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed the return type of the slot number in cluster shards to integer, making it consistent with past behavior.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed CLUSTER commands called from modules or scripts to return TLS info appropriately.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Fixed a crash in redis-cli on reconnect when in SUBSCRIBE mode.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Fixed an overflow calculation for the next timer event.
